name: The Potion Seller
description:
The Potion Seller

You freshly arrived in town, people are excited to buy your wonderful potions. You're old and forgetful though, let's hope you don't mix up recipes and end up turning people into sheep...

Try to make as much money as you can before you run out of customers... or before something worse happens!

A Game made by Botanic Games.
  • Art: Louxie
  • Music and Sound: Soreine
  • Code: Shagar

All sound effects are either created for this project, or royalty free from FreeSound.org.

And a huge help from Brackeys and Code Monkey.

And a huge thanks to you!

For playing this game! Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2

Please leave a comment on your impressions, what you like, what you would like to see and of course if you encounter some bugs (yes, yes, there are some... we tried!)

Also feel free to tell us what highscore you got! (ours was 3950 gold)  

Controls

Click everywhere on everything. Something should happen. Then you should be able to understand the mechanic.

Hint: Potions are sold automatically, and you can change the order by taking and dragging the first ones to make them go at the end of the line.
